#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
 
typedef long long ll;
 
int main(){
	ll T,N,i,j;
	string str;
	cin >> T;
	while(T--){
		cin >> str;
		ll sum = 0 ;
		for(i = 0 ; i < str.length() ; i++){
			if(!(str[i]>='a' && str[i]<='z') )
				sum += (ll)(str[i]-'0');
		}
		cout << sum << endl;
	}
}
